messages.subject: re: NJ unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings! I am also in NJ...Atlantic County (near Atlantic City). We have been hs ing about a year now. We tried school at home first...but realized fairly
messages.messageBody:
Greetings!

I am also in NJ...Atlantic County (near Atlantic City). We have been hs'ing
about a year now. We tried "school at home" first...but realized fairly
quickly that it wasn't for us. I didn't have any real knowledge of
unschooling and no examples of it, so we stayed somewhat in "limbo" for a
little while, as I tried to figure things out. Meanwhile, my oldest started
doing a few things on her own, and so--here we are--unschooling (although dh
is still a bit concerned over it).

:) K
